meanings.definition: A contagious bacterial infection causing inflammation and swelling of the gums.
meanings.sent1: After neglecting dental hygiene, she developed gingilis and had to see a dentist.
meanings.sent2: The dentist diagnosed her with gingilis after noticing her swollen gums.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character had a case of gingilis, making it hard for him to smile.
meanings.sent4: The gingilis spread through the town like wildfire, affecting everyone's oral health.
meanings.sent5: The image of the red, inflamed gums from gingilis stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: To experience pain or discomfort in the gums.
meanings.sent1: She winced as she gingilised while biting into an apple.
meanings.sent2: He knew he had gingilised when brushing his teeth caused discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The baby's crying was due to gingilising from teething.
meanings.sent4: The athlete had to endure gingilising during the match, affecting his focus.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain of gingilising made her avoid cold drinks.

meanings.definition: A medication or treatment used to alleviate gum inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The dentist prescribed a strong gingilis to reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent2: She applied the gingilis to her gums to soothe the inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The minty taste of the gingilis made the treatment more bearable.
meanings.sent4: The herbal gingilis worked wonders in calming down the gum inflammation.
meanings.sent5: The cooling effect of the gingilis brought relief to her sore gums.
